name: Oh! Shoot!
description:
Shoot the squares. Kill the squares. How long can you last?

left click to shoot.

Upgrades guide:


Gives the player a damaging aura. Getting more increases the size of the aura, as well as the damage it deals.


Makes the player shoot +1 times per shot.


Increases damage dealt per shot.


Increases attack speed. Also lets you hold click to shoot.


Adds a drone that orbits the player and shoots out at regular intervals. Getting more increases the fire-rate of the drone. The drone deals the same damage as the player, so if you have damage upgrades, the drone has damage upgrades.


Doubles the amount of directions you shoot in.  Appears maximum of twice at set points.
